tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Eisha is extremely Professional and I feel extremely lucky to have found her for my Dental needs. Having come to India from Canada I was looking for a good Dental professional here in Delhi while staying at my relatives. She immediately found the root cause of my problems for which I was being made to beat around the bushes in Canada and the cost was unbelievable. Here I have been suggested a very organic way to deal with my problem and I am sure by the end of my second and last sitting I will be better. Koodo‚Äôs to Dr Kathuria  and team .
Thank you very much for all your help and support.
Warmest wishes 
Nipun Gosain

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Long and tedious sittings but very skillfully handled by the expertise of Dr Eisha with great deal of patience comforting me at every stage of treatment.
Definitely patient friendly doctor besides a good soul who knows her job well n treat you well too.
At last I must say the entire process was more like a high tea to me than a tedious treatment, though tea n snacks replaced by modern sanitized gadgets, in well neat and clean clinic with ever smiling staff.
Jokes apart, it's definitely worth visiting once to feel the difference.
God Bless Dr Eisha and her clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Very nice arrangment* *********** ***********
Since you have already made your name/reputation in the locality, may like to reduce charges.

I personally feel that doctor's very important job is to treat as many patients as possible. He/She is considered next to God. 

Keeping charges on higher side you attract affluent people only. Even middle/upper middle class people may not afford to take your services.

My good wishes are there with you. Keep it up and try to serve the society at large.

Regards.
Arun Malik
Addl. General  Manager Rlys (Retd)

review: Dr. Eisha gave me an excellent experience. She is very reassuring while giving cleared and detailed explanation. She is very transparent in explaining the problem and it's solutions. It was very comfortable experience. Happy to get excellent results.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Got my RCT & impacted wisdom tooth removal successfully, Being a person who never visited any dentist I was very skeptical & worried about the overall process & Pain.
But Doctor Eisha won my confidence in the first meet.
She is a very good listener, her patience & expertise in this field were the key factors which eliminated all my fears.
Entire process was smooth & flawless.

Super Super recommended !!!   Special Thanks to support team "Aarti" "Deepak" & "Nitin"  :)

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dentist office is very hygienic . The dentist(the Eisha Kathuria) is absolutely fantastic professional. The dental assistants are just as gifted. The front desk staff is also nice. I highly doubt I will ever be as satisfied by another dental office. 5 stars all day.
